.. include:: headings.inc



.. _wx.KeyCategoryFlags:

==========================================================================================================================================
|phoenix_title|  **wx.KeyCategoryFlags**
==========================================================================================================================================



The `KeyCategoryFlags` enumeration provides the following values:



================================================================================ ================================================================================
**Description**                                                                  **Value**
================================================================================ ================================================================================
``wx.WXK_CATEGORY_ARROW``                                                        arrow keys, on and off numeric keypads                      
``wx.WXK_CATEGORY_PAGING``                                                       page up and page down keys, on and off numeric keypads                      
``wx.WXK_CATEGORY_JUMP``                                                         home and end keys, on and off numeric keypads                      
``wx.WXK_CATEGORY_TAB``                                                          tab key, on and off numeric keypads                      
``wx.WXK_CATEGORY_CUT``                                                          backspace and delete keys, on and off numeric keypads                      
``wx.WXK_CATEGORY_NAVIGATION``                                                   union of ``wx.WXK_CATEGORY_ARROW``, ``wx.WXK_CATEGORY_PAGING``, and ``wx.WXK_CATEGORY_JUMP`` categories                      
================================================================================ ================================================================================

|
